SetEnvUIConfig.DialogCaption: Deployment Framework for BizTalk Sample - BasicMasterBindings

SetEnvUIConfigItem.PromptText: Enter the domain-qualified account name used by the BizTalk host instance to read/write from/to FILE port physical paths:
Select the XML file that contains configuration information specific to this environment:

Is this the LAST server in the BizTalk Group you are deploying to?
If so, BizTalk assemblies will be deployed to the BizTalk Management Database.
SetEnvUIConfigItem.Caption: This is the LAST server in the BizTalk Group
